recipe.title: Chickpea Sweet Potato Stew Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 15 oz ; chickpeas, 1 can, drained and rinsed ; (425 g)
2 cups ; sweet potato, peeled and diced ; (400 g)
15 oz ; fire roasted crushed tomato, 1 can ; (425 g)

steps.step: In large pot or Dutch oven, heat the coconut oil over medium heat. Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onion and cook for 4-5 minutes, or until the onion is semi-translucent.
Add the garlic and ginger, and cook for 2-3 more minutes, until fragrant. Then add the sweet paprika, cumin, coriander, and cayenne and cook for 2 more minutes, until fragrant.
Add the chickpeas, sweet potatoes, crushed tomatoes, and vegetable broth, and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the sweet potatoes are tender.
Add the spinach and stir until wilted.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In large pot or Dutch oven, add the coconut oil over medium heat.
Once the oil begins to shimmer, add the onions and cook for about 4-5 minutes, or until onions are semi-translucent.
Add in the garlic and ginger, and cook for 2-3 more minutes until fragrant.
Then add sweet paprika, cumin, coriander, and cayenne, and cook for 2 more minutes until fragrant.
Add in the chickpeas, sweet potatoes, crushed tomatoes, and vegetable broth, and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat to medium-high and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until sweet potatoes are tender.
Add in spinach and stir until wilted.
